channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Women’s Ankles At Higher Risk In Crashes Toyota Research Shows
item.description: It doesn’t matter what shoes female drivers are wearing, women suffer more severe ankle injuries than men in a crash, Toyota research reveals.

item.title: ‘Escape From Tarkov’ Server Maintenance Incoming, Game Will Go Offline
item.description: Server maintenance is coming for Escape From Tarkov, so the game will be unavailable for a few hours later today while it takes place.

item.title: A Psychologist Gives 3 Reasons For The ‘Love-Jealousy Loop’ In Couples
item.description: Romantic jealousy is a complex emotion as its roots go very deep into our psyche—down to the psychological and evolutionary strata.
